Room.Name: Khallazar's Compound
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing beneath a canopy of ropes criss-crossed between the trees, and supporting an odd looking hut two meters over your head.
Room.LongDescription: Most of the vegetation around you looks in good health, but toward the back side of the house there is a steady trickle of acid, creating a small stream flowing to the south. The vegetation in that direction has grown wildly and turned wierd colors, and writhes with a life of its own. A rope ladder hangs from the overhead canopy.
